content: this legal document explains the progress of a divorce case filed by two parties they have agreed to proceed with a mutual consent divorce and have made agreements regarding various aspects of their separation this includes the division of assets debts and liabilities as well as arrangements for the custody and residence of their children they have waived the need for spousal maintenance and have chosen the jurisdiction of the family court in brussels for their divorce proceedings the document also mentions the costs and taxes associated with the divorce process additionally it discusses the selection of the registration office the choice of residence by one of the parties and the confirmation of identity by a notary the parties have reviewed and signed the document in the presence of the notary
